name: Dark Goatlings Theme
description:
A dark theme for the website Goatlings. Features art (the banner) by Webscriptor at Tumblr.

Some of the images on the site don't mesh well with the dark theme, but I can't do much about that- it has to do entirely with the file type that the images are saved in (gif). I'm not about to redo all of the images on the site- sorry!
